Title: Morphine
Description: Morphine is a new media player with beautiful interface. It uses Windows Media Player engine to play media and WPF to render UI.
HomeWiki:
Morphine
Morphine is a new media player with beautiful interface. It uses Windows Media Player engine to play media and WPF to render UI.

For now it can:
- Play any audio files that WMP can play
- Display info and album art
- Open playlists that WMP can open
- Play/Pause and switch tracks by pressing keyboard multimedia keys
- Change playing position
- Play tracks in shuffle mode
- Switch to mini mode
- Play previous playlist




System Requirements
- Windows 7
- Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0
